Name: Endpoint
Desc: After eliminating crucial Kuroro, the endpoint will be activated. Reach the endpoint to end the stage.

Name: Spike
Desc: Spikes will come out when you walk past and no one can pass.

Name: Stone Gate
Desc: Step on the Stone Gate Mechanism to lower all the Stone Gates and pass.

Name: Endpoint
Desc: After eliminating crucial Kuroro, the endpoint will be activated. Reach the endpoint to end the stage.

Name: Stone Gate Mechanism
Desc: Step on the Stone Gate Mechanism to lower all the Stone Gates and pass.

Name: Electro-Wall
Desc: When powered on, the Electro-Wall will eliminate anything that touches it. Step on its switch to turn it off.

Name: Trap
Desc: When you step on a trap, you will fall into it and be eliminated.

Name: Electro-Wall Switch
Desc: The switch of the Electro-Wall. Step on it to power on the Electro-Wall.

Name: Electro-Wall Switch
Desc: The switch of the Electro-Wall. Step on it to power on the Electro-Wall.

Name: Shadow
Desc: 影子会跟随主控角色一起移动，初始拥有火元素。

Name: Grass Field
Desc: 阻挡经过的角色。遇火则会燃烧，燃烧的草圃会点燃周围的单位和其他草圃。可以反弹物理属性的单位。

Name: Pool
Desc: 碰到水池的角色，会停止移动。接触到藤球生长成草圃。

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Teleporting Mist
Desc: Teleport through resonance with characters carrying Dark Attribute.

Name: Green SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Yellow SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Purple SFX of Teleporting (Opening and Closing)
Lightning Circle
Desc: It will trap any Lightning characters passing through it and be destroyed when Dark characters pass through it.

Name: Ice
Desc: You can easily melt floating ice on the water with fire.

Name: Shadow · Dark
Desc: Your shadow will move along with you. When passing by steel plates, the shadow with the dark element will make them disappear.

Name: Shadow · Ice
Desc: Your shadow will move along with you. The shadow with the ice element can break the bubble and make it disappear.

Name: Shadow · Fire
Desc: Your shadow will move along with you. When walking over the ice, the shadow with the fire element will melt it.

Name: Shadow · Lightning
Desc: Your shadow will move along with you. When touching the grass, the shadow with the lightning element will make it grow.

Name: Shadow · Physical
Desc: Your shadow will move along with you, kill enemies, and touch various mechanisms.

Name: Shadow
Desc: 影子会跟随本体角色一起移动，初始携带火元素。

Name: Bubble
Desc: A light, transparent bubble that can only be touched and pushed by the physical element and will be broken by the ice element.

Name: Bunny
Desc: Tap the bunny that fell on the cube to pick it up.

Name: Bunny
Desc: Tap the bunny that fell on the cube to pick it up.

Name: Bunny
Desc: Tap the bunny that fell on the cube to pick it up.

Name: Bunny
Desc: Tap the bunny that fell on the cube to pick it up.

Name: Swapping Circle
Desc: A shining magic circle that can swap the ally unit here with another unit.

Name: Type Switch
Desc: 切换角色所携带的属性。

Name: Torch
Desc: A lit torch will affect the surrounding 8 blocks and unit statuses in the next turn.

Name: 火属性特效
Desc: 身上拥有火属性时显示特效

Name: 物理属性特效
Desc: 身上拥有水属性石显示特效

Name: 草拥有火属性特效
Desc: 草身上拥有火属性时显示特效

Name: 库洛洛
Desc: 关键的敌人，消灭库洛洛即可解锁终点。

Name: 鲨士碧儿
Desc: 危险的敌人，会消灭面前的敌人，可以尝试从侧面和背后攻击他。

Name: Rattan Ball
Desc: 被撞击后会继承角色的属性，撞击其他地块或单位可以产生对应属性的交互效果。
